abstract: Google disclosed discussions with the Federal Trade Commission over ties between the boards of Google and Apple.
snippet: Google disclosed discussions with the Federal Trade Commission over ties between the boards of Google and Apple.
lead_paragraph: MOUNTAIN VIEW, Calif.  Google executives acknowledged Thursday that the Federal Trade Commission was inquiring about the antitrust implications of the ties between the boards of Google and Apple.

headline.main: Google Says It’s in Talks With F.T.C. on Antitrust
headline.print_headline: Google Says It’s in Talks With F.T.C. On Antitrust

abstract: Bank of America is looking for new directors following a shareholder revolt that stripped Chief Executive Kenneth D. Lewis of his chairman’s title, the bank said during a conference call Thursday discussing the government’s stress tests results.
lead_paragraph: Bank of America is looking for new directors following a shareholder revolt that stripped Chief Executive Kenneth D. Lewis of his chairman’s title, the bank said during a conference call Thursday discussing the government’s stress tests results.

headline.main: Bank of America Seeks New Board Members
